history.proof: intros x Hx. unfold inf. apply supM. intros y Hy. sfirstorder depth: 3use: poset_refl.

ctx: apply poset_trans with (y := sup [Pred x | forall y0 : T, y0 \In s -> x <== y0]).
exceptions.exn: In environment T : lattice s : Pred_Class x : T Hx : x \\In s y : T Hy : y \\In [Pred x | forall y : T, y \\In s -> x <== y] Unable to unify "x" with "sup [Pred x | forall y0 : T, y0 \\In s -> x <== y0]".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: lattice
s: Pred_Class

Goal:
forall x : T, x \In s -> inf s <== x

Premises:
List.In : forall A : Type, A -> seq A -> Prop
inf = fun s : Pred T => sup [Pred x | forall y : T, y \In s -> x <== y] : Pred T -> T
supM : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> sup s <== x
LatticeMixin : forall (T : poset) (mx_sup : Pred T -> T), (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s) -> (forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x) -> Lattice.mixin_of T
supP : forall (T : lattice) (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== sup s
Record mixin_of (T : poset) : Type := Mixin { mx_sup : Pred T -> T; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), x \In s -> x <== mx_sup s; _ : forall (s : Pred T) (x : T), (forall y : T, y \In s -> y <== x) -> mx_sup s <== x } Arguments Lattice.Mixin [T] [mx_sup]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
In_split : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq_PredType T), x \In s -> exists s1 s2 : seq T, s = s1 ++ x :: s2
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] -> exists y : ?T, ?x = ?f y /\ y \In ?s where ?T : [T : lattice s : Pred_Class |- Type] ?T' : [T : lattice s : Pred_Class |- Type] ?f : [T : lattice s : Pred_Class |- ?T -> ?T'] ?x : [T : lattice s : Pred_Class |- ?T'] ?s : [T : lattice s : Pred_Class |- seq ?T]
In_cons : forall (T : Type) (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s < -> x = y \/ x \In s
Mem_map : forall (T T' : Type) (f : T -> T') (x : T) (s : seq T), x \In s -> f x \In [seq f i | i <- s]
InE : forall T : Type, (forall x y : T, x \In [:: y] <-> x = y) * (forall (y : T) (s : seq T) (x : T), x \In y :: s <-> x = y \/ x \In s) * (forall (T0 : Type) (x : T0) (p : Simpl_Pred T0), (x \In p) = p x)
poset_trans : forall (T : poset) (y x z : T), x <== y -> y <== z -> x <== z
relaxP : forall (T : poset) (P1 P2 : T), P1 <== P2 -> forall p : T, p <== P1 -> p <== P2
poset_asym : forall (T : poset) (x y : T), x <== y -> y <== x -> x = y
PosetMixin : forall (T : Type) (mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop), (forall x : T, mx_leq x x) -> (forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y) -> (forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z) -> Poset.mixin_of T
Record mixin_of (T : Type) : Type := Mixin { mx_leq : T -> T -> Prop; _ : forall x : T, mx_leq x x; _ : forall x y : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y x -> x = y; _ : forall x y z : T, mx_leq x y -> mx_leq y z -> mx_leq x z } Arguments Poset.mixin_of _%type_scope Arguments Poset.Mixin [T]%type_scope [mx_leq]%function_scope (_ _ _)%function_scope
poset_refl : forall (T : poset) (x : T), x <== x
sub_leq : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T), {x : T | x \In s} -> {x : T | x \In s} -> Prop
dependentReturnType : forall (T : Type) (P : T -> Type), (forall x : T, P x) -> T -> Type
sub_asym : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y x -> x = y
InMem_morph : forall (T : Type) (x y : T), x = y -> forall x0 y0 : Mem_Pred T, EqMem x0 y0 -> InMem x x0 < -> InMem y y0
Mem_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), x \In s1 ++ s2 < -> x \In s1 \/ x \In s2
sub_trans : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}) (y z : {x0 : T | x0 \In s}), sub_leq x y -> sub_leq y z -> sub_leq x z
Image_mem : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (P : Pred A) (x : A), x \In P -> f x \In [Image f i | i <- P]
map = fun (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) => fix map (s : seq T1) : seq T2 := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => f x :: map s' end : forall T1 T2 : Type, (T1 -> T2) -> seq T1 -> seq T2 Arguments map {T1 T2}%type_scope _%function_scope _%seq_scope
Lattice.Pack : forall sort : Type, Lattice.class_of sort -> Type -> lattice
sub_refl : forall (T : poset) (s : Pred T) (x : {x : T | x \In s}), sub_leq x x
Mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : PredType T) => nosimpl (let '@PropPredType _ Pred_Sort0 toPred s as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> Mem_Pred T) in let '@exist _ _ mem _ as s0 := s return (PropPredType s0 -> Mem_Pred T) in mem) : forall (T : Type) (pT : PredType T), pT -> Mem_Pred T Arguments Mem {T}%type_scope {pT}
Mem_Seq1 : forall (T : Type) (x y : T), x \In [:: y] < -> x = y
In_nil : forall (T : Type) (x : T), x \In [::] < -> False
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : Relation_Definitions.relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x a -> P x a

```coq
intros x Hx.
unfold inf.
apply supM.
intros y Hy.
apply poset_trans with (y := sup [Pred x | forall y0 : T, y0 \In s -> x <== y0]).
- apply supP; auto.
- apply poset_refl.
Qed.```

original: intros x Hx. unfold inf. apply supM. intros y Hy. apply poset_trans with (y := sup [Pred x | forall y0 : T, y0 \In s -> x <== y0]). - apply supP; auto. - apply poset_refl.
